headline: VZ Upgrades Network of Monumental Sports: Will it Fuel Revenues?
summary: Verizon's new 100G optical ring for Monumental Sports strengthens venue connectivity and supports its digital transformation push.

headline: Verizon Communications Inc. (VZ) is Attracting Investor Attention: Here is What You Should Know
